destinations.name: Eiffel Tower
destinations.description: Iconic iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It's one of the world's most recognizable landmarks.

destinations.name: Machu Picchu
destinations.description: Ancient Incan city set high in the Andes Mountains in Peru, renowned for its sophisticated dry-stone walls and panoramic views.

destinations.name: Great Barrier Reef
destinations.description: World's largest coral reef system off the coast of Queensland, Australia, home to diverse marine life and vibrant coral formations.

destinations.name: Santorini
destinations.description: Picturesque Greek island known for its stunning sunsets, white-washed buildings, and blue-domed churches overlooking the Aegean Sea.

destinations.name: Taj Mahal
destinations.description: Magnificent white marble mausoleum in Agra, India, built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife.

destinations.name: Grand Canyon
destinations.description: Vast and colorful canyon carved by the Colorado River in Arizona, USA, offering breathtaking views and hiking opportunities.

destinations.name: Petra
destinations.description: Ancient city in southern Jordan famous for its rock-cut architecture, especially the iconic Treasury facade.

destinations.name: Angkor Wat
destinations.description: Massive temple complex in Cambodia, originally constructed as a Hindu temple dedicated to Vishnu, later transformed into a Buddhist monument.

destinations.name: Yellowstone National Park
destinations.description: America's first national park, known for its geothermal features, diverse wildlife, and stunning landscapes.

destinations.name: Venice
destinations.description: Romantic Italian city built on more than 100 small islands in a lagoon in the Adriatic Sea, famous for its canals and historic architecture.

destinations.name: Bora Bora
destinations.description: Small South Pacific island northwest of Tahiti in French Polynesia, known for its turquoise lagoon, overwater bungalows, and luxury resorts.

destinations.name: Maasai Mara
destinations.description: Large game reserve in Narok County, Kenya, contiguous with the Serengeti National Park in Tanzania, famous for its exceptional population of lions, leopards, cheetahs, and annual wildebeest migration.

destinations.name: Dubrovnik
destinations.description: Croatian city on the Adriatic Sea, known for its distinctive Old Town, encircled with massive stone walls completed in the 16th century.

destinations.name: Galápagos Islands
destinations.description: Volcanic archipelago in the Pacific Ocean, part of Ecuador, known for its diverse and unique wildlife that inspired Charles Darwin's theory of evolution.

destinations.name: Banff National Park
destinations.description: Canada's oldest national park, located in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta, known for its turquoise lakes, snow-capped peaks, and abundant wildlife.

destinations.name: Kyoto
destinations.description: Former imperial capital of Japan, famous for its numerous classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces, Shinto shrines and traditional wooden houses.

destinations.name: Iguazu Falls
destinations.description: Massive waterfalls system along the border of Argentina and Brazil, surrounded by lush subtropical rainforest.

destinations.name: Cappadocia
destinations.description: Semi-arid region in central Turkey, known for its distinctive 'fairy chimneys,' tall, cone-shaped rock formations clustered in Monks Valley, Göreme and elsewhere.

destinations.name: Salar de Uyuni
destinations.description: World's largest salt flat, located in Bolivia, offering surreal landscapes especially during the rainy season when it becomes a giant mirror.

destinations.name: Petra
destinations.description: Ancient city in southern Jordan famous for its rock-cut architecture, especially the iconic Treasury facade.

destinations.name: Zhangjiajie National Forest Park
destinations.description: Unique national park in China's Hunan Province, known for its towering sandstone pillars, the inspiration for the 'Hallelujah Mountains' in the movie Avatar.

destinations.name: Amalfi Coast
destinations.description: Stunning stretch of coastline on the southern edge of Italy's Sorrentine Peninsula, known for its dramatic cliffs and picturesque towns.
